https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3vIZ3x4BIA1SjsGXYAxWUXu7LBC.jpg Director Alan Smithee takes us on an irreverent (and unauthorized) romp through George A. Romero's classic Night of the Living Dead, the film that spawned the modern zombie craze and a thousand "of the living dead" remakes and rip-offs. Another Night of the Living Dead
